sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from 'react'; import {PeopleContext} from '../contexts/PeopleContextProvider'; import {Table} from 'evergreen-ui' const TableComponent = () => { const {data} = useContext(PeopleContext); return( First Name Last Name Name City State {data.map(person => ( alert(person.name)}> {person.first_name} {person.last_name} {person.city} {person.state} ))}
) } export default TableComponent;
